nodes.text: Shassa lived on the planet Coruscant and served as a police officer with the Coruscant Security Force. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic the reconstituted Sith Empire, she supplied her fellow officers with armor from a small shop near the taxi station in Black Sun territory.
Shassa was a Human female with dark brown hair, black eyes and he had fair skin. Berric wore a Coruscant Security Force uniform and carried a side arm blaster pistol.
Shassa appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a armor vendor on Coruscant.
